versions.title: Version 0.4 | 2.12.2023
versions.content:
Updates:

  • Foggy atmosphere changing bug fix (now its not changing randomly)
  • Gun shop's gun's images added
  • Map is updated
  • SAVE SYSTEM IS ADDED (only for money and samples, thats mean your purchased guns is not will be saved)
  • Bunker code is added into game (its somewhere in the map)
  • Sell Zone added
  • Money system changed. When you killed a zombie you need collect his/her sample and sell them to Sell Zone
